mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE role_hierarchy (id, role_code, role_name, created_at, updated_at, upper_id, Level) AS ( SELECT id, role_code, role_name, created_at, updated_at, upper_id, 1 AS Level FROM role WHERE upper_id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT r.id, r.role_code, r.role_name, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.upper_id, rh.Level + 1 FROM role r INNER JOIN role_hierarchy rh ON r.upper_id = rh.id ) SELECT id, role_code, role_name, created_at, updated_at, upper_id, Level FROM role_hierarchy ORDER BY ID, UPPER_ID ASC, Level ASC
